docs:
# Getting started with Wrike

To use any of the above modules, you need to have a [Wrike](https://www.wrike.com) account and connect it to Integromat.

## Connecting the Wrike service to Integromat

To connect your Wrike account to Integromat, follow the general instructions for [Connecting to services](https://support.integromat.com/hc/en-us/articles/360001990194#create-a-connection). After you click the *Continue* button, a dialog box appears requesting your email and password. When you enter the requested information, you will be prompted to grant Integromat access to your Wrike data.

![Permissions](https://integromat.zendesk.com/hc/article_attachments/360009259214/wrike.jpeg)

Here, allow access by clicking the **Accept** button. Afterwards, you will be redirected back to the Integromat administration page. Now you can continue and finish your scenario. 
 
# Webhooks

If you stop using an instant trigger, Integromat will automatically start to reject new incoming messages from the service. After three unsuccessful delivery attempts, the service itself will stop sending new notifications. So if you have a webhook that you do not use for a long time, it may happen that Wrike deactivates it and you will have to create a new one.

modifyTask.apiJsonc:
{
	"url": "/tasks/{{parameters.id}}",
	"body": {
		"dates": "{{ifempty(buildDates(parameters.dates), undefined)}}",
		"title": "{{parameters.title}}",
		"follow": "{{parameters.follow}}",
		"status": "{{parameters.status}}",
		"metadata": "{{stringify(parameters.metadata)}}",
		"addShareds": "{{'[' + parameters.addShareds + ']'}}",
		"importance": "{{parameters.importance}}",
		"description": "{{parameters.description}}",
		"addFollowers": "{{'[' + parameters.addFollowers + ']'}}",
		"customFields": "{{stringify(parameters.customFields)}}",
		"customStatus": "{{parameters.customStatus}}",
		"removeShareds": "{{'[' + parameters.removeShareds + ']'}}",
		"addResponsibles": "{{'[' + parameters.addResponsibles + ']'}}",
		"addSuperTasks": "{{'[' + parameters.addSuperTasks + ']'}}",
		"removeSuperTasks": "{{'[' + parameters.removeSuperTasks + ']'}}",
		"removeResponsibles": "{{'[' + parameters.removeResponsibles + ']'}}"
	},
	"type": "urlencoded",
	"method": "PUT",
	"response": {
		"output": {
			"success": "{{if(statusCode == 200, true, false)}}"
		}
	}
}
